descriptionText: Our hackathons are a playground for visionaries, developers, and Lightning Network enthusiasts to come together and push the boundaries of what's possible with Bitcoin technology.
data: Prizes and recognition for the most groundbreaking projects utilizing the Lightning Network.
Valuable feedback from experienced judges and mentors.
Opportunities to connect with leading industry professionals in the Lightning Network space.
A chance to make a real impact on the future of Bitcoin's ecosystem.
